title: Squads
full_text:
Squads

Squads
Squads are a way to temporarily track a handful of other players, usually friends, who can be invited by Roblox username. Squads show the current system of other squad members, highlight squad members in chat and in ships, and all squad members can accompany the squad host to faction missions.

sections.title: Squads
sections.content: Squads are a way to temporarily track a handful of other players, usually friends, who can be invited by Roblox username. Squads show the current system of other squad members, highlight squad members in chat and in ships, and all squad members can accompany the squad host to faction missions.
